nodes.bodyText: I think ideally we would have the logic we want to share from :ql:test in a separate test fixture only project. Or is :qa already such a fixture project? then we probably want to move the shared fixtures into the main sourceSet of :qa instead
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@ dependencies {
   api project(':test:framework')
   api project(path: xpackModule('core'), configuration: 'default')
   api project(path: xpackModule('core'), configuration: 'testArtifacts')
-  api project(path: xpackModule('ql'), configuration: 'testArtifacts')
+  api project(xpackModule('ql:test'))

nodes.bodyText: Ah forget my comment. I was confused. :qa:test is that test fixture project. 🤦
